desc: Lanto Sinus is the pure L. sakei probiotic for sinus infections, sinusitis, and sinus health. Contains kimchi derived Lactobacillus sakei, a beneficial bacteria found in healthy sinuses. Support the sinus microbiome with sinus probiotics by introducing bacteria into the mouth and sinuses.

layout.text: The natural way to support sinus health.
Probiotic powder for use by nose & mouth.
